text.en: Oṃ svasti!
text.en-trans: om svasti

text.en: The Blessed One Śākyamuni, his Close Sons, the great elders,
text.en-trans: chomden shak tub nyesé neten ché

text.en: Scholars and adepts of India and Tibet and hosts of vidyādharas,
text.en-trans: gya bö khedrub rigdzin tsok nam kyi

text.en: Let your blessings descend as cascading white lotuses,
text.en-trans: jinlab pema karpo char du nyil

text.en: And let auspiciousness reign throughout the three times.
text.en-trans: dü sum küntu tashi gyal gyur chik

text.en: Gurus of the mind-direct, sign and aural transmissions,
text.en-trans: gong da nyengyü rigdzin lama dang

text.en: Peaceful and wrathful yidams, ḍākinīs of the three abodes,
text.en-trans: yidam zhitro né sum daki tsok

text.en: Oath-bound dharma protectors, wealth deities, treasure-keepers and local spirits,
text.en-trans: damchen chökyong norlha ter zhidak

text.en: Turn your attention towards us, here and now.
text.en-trans: dengdir dakchak nam la gongpar dzö

text.en: Great sovereign of non-referential love and compassion,
text.en-trans: mikméjampanyingjé ngadak ché

text.en: Ever perfect great Vajradhara Hevajra,
text.en-trans: kunzang dorjé chang chen hé benza

text.en: And Cakrasaṃvara, master1of supreme joy—
text.en-trans: rabtugawé wanggyur khorlo dom

text.en: To the vajra holder of the teachings, who is indivisible from them, I pray.2
text.en-trans: yermétendzindorjér solwa deb

text.en: Regarding beings with great love like that for a child,
text.en-trans: jampachenpö dro la bu zhin gong

text.en: Powerful and pre-eminent yogin, lord of siddhas,
text.en-trans: tutobnaljorpuljung drubpé jé

text.en: Whose splendour softens the harshness of ignorance and hatred—
text.en-trans: kün mong zhedang tawajampépal

text.en: Supremely excellent guru, to you I pray.3
text.en-trans: zangpöchokgyur lamar solwa deb

text.en: Magical manifestation of Mañjughoṣa’s wisdom,
text.en-trans: jampalyangkyi yeshe gyumé trul

text.en: Lord of knowledge and love, master of the teachings.
text.en-trans: khyendangtsewéwangpokabab dün

text.en: Who draws the chariot of wondrous sevenfold transmission,4
text.en-trans: ngotsar shingta dren dzé tenpé dak

text.en: Ösal Trulpe Dorje, to you I pray.5
text.en-trans: ösal trulpé dorjér solwa deb

text.en: As I pray from the depths of my heart in this way,
text.en-trans: detar nying né solwa tabpa la

text.en: May the supreme guides, father and son alike, look on me with compassion.
text.en-trans: dren chok yabsé nam kyi tukjé zik

text.en: Whatever befalls this child of yours, happiness or sorrow, good or bad,
text.en-trans: bu la kyiduk leknyé chi jung yang

text.en: By placing my trust in you, the guru fathers and son,
text.en-trans: lama yabsé tsok la lo té na

text.en: Watch over me with your eyes of knowledge and love,
text.en-trans: ngepar khyentsé chen gyi tsawa dang

text.en: And never release me from your loving embrace,
text.en-trans: jampé chak gi namyang mi tongwar

text.en: But always protect me in this life, the next life, and the bardos, I pray.
text.en-trans: di chi bardo küntu kyab tu sol

text.en: Now that we have reached the final five-hundred year age,
text.en-trans: dani ngabgyé tama yang tar lhung

text.en: Buddha’s teachings have almost set below the western peak.
text.en-trans: sangye tenpa nub rir zhol la nyé

text.en: The world teems with evildoers and barbarian hordes.
text.en-trans: dik chö lalö sateng tamché khyab

text.en: At this time, when everyone seems intent upon misery,
text.en-trans: kyendro tamché duk la tö dü dir

text.en: May the strength and compassion of the guru fathers and son
text.en-trans: lama yabsé tukjé tutob kyi

text.en: Reach their full force and the ills of this age be averted.
text.en-trans: tsalshuk chung la dü kyi güpa dok

text.en: May all that obstructs the teachings be entirely eliminated,
text.en-trans: tenpé gek chak malü salwa dang

text.en: And the dominion of the dharma-protecting king endure.
text.en-trans: chökyong gyalpö chabsi yünten dzö

text.en: May those who curse men and women with obstructing forces
text.en-trans: kyendro pomö shé gyü gek kyi lam

text.en: And who threaten the welfare of the teachings and beings
text.en-trans: ten drö dekyi trokpar jepa nam

text.en: Be swiftly pacified, their minds filled with benevolence,
text.en-trans: nyurdu zhi né jampé semden zhing

text.en: So that all may treat one another like parents.
text.en-trans: pentsün pama tabur gyurwar dzö

text.en: May we effortlessly accomplish all our aspirations and deeds
text.en-trans: dakchak nam kyang chö tün samjor tsok

text.en: That accord with the Dharma, and may we never be harmed
text.en-trans: bemé drub ching lhamin jungpo yi

text.en: By non-human spirits and forces, but be entirely victorious.
text.en-trans: nö tsé mitsuk chok lé nampar gyal

text.en: May illness and evil influence be pacified, so that our lives may reach their full extent.
text.en-trans: né dang dön zhi tsé tarchinpar dzö

text.en: In the pleasant medicinal land of fourfold well-being and tenfold virtue,6
text.en-trans: dé zhi gé chü men jong nyamgawar

text.en: In the monastery at the peak of the divine mountain of auspiciousness,7
text.en-trans: tashi lha ri tsemö gönpa ru

text.en: Is the dharma palace of the all-knowing guru, wherein
text.en-trans: künkhyen lamé chö kyi podrang der

text.en: May gladness,8fortune and excellence increase.
text.en-trans: bak peb tashi gelek gyepar dzö

text.en: So that this prayer may be accomplished just so,
text.en-trans: detar solwa tab zhin drubpa la

text.en: Let buddhas, bodhisattvas, śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas,
text.en-trans: sangye changsem nyenrang lasok dang

text.en: And especially the Lord of Oḍḍiyāna, embodiment of all Three Roots,
text.en-trans: khyepar tsa sum kündü orgyen jé

text.en: Grant their blessings, bolstered by the force of truth itself,
text.en-trans: denpé gyab kyor dendön ngönsum du

text.en: That it may be swiftly brought about, I pray.
text.en-trans: nyurdu drubpar jingyi lab tu sol
